<title level="1" right="Trait">[Troll](/Traits.aspx?ID=777)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 363 <sup>1.1</sup>

Trolls are giant, brutish creatures and are well known for transforming into inanimate materials.
